root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_ASS_BACK_M AS SELECT RS.GROUP_ID, --集团ID RS.HOS_ID, --医院ID RS.COPY_CODE, --账套编码 RS.ASS_BACK_NO AS BUSINESS_ID, --退货单ID RS.ASS_BACK_NO AS BUSINESS_NO, --退货单号 RS.ASS_NATURS,--归属 RS.ASS_NATURS_NAME,--归属名称 RS.STORE_ID, --仓库ID HST.STORE_NO, --仓库变更ID HST.STORE_CODE, --仓库编码 HST.STORE_NAME, --仓库名称 RS.VEN_ID SUP_ID, --供应商ID HSD.SUP_NO, --供应商变更ID HSD.SUP_CODE, --供应商编码 HSD.SUP_NAME, --供应商名称 RS.BACK_MONEY, --退货金额 RS.CREATE_EMP MAKER, --制单人ID SM.USER_NAME AS MAKER_NAME, --制单人名称 RS.CREATE_DATE AS MAKE_DATE, --编制日期 RS.BACK_DATE AS BUSI_DATE, --业务日期 RS.CONFIRM_EMP CONFIRMER, --确认人ID SF.USER_NAME AS CONFIRMER_NAME, --确认人 RS.STATE , --状态 CASE WHEN NVL(RS.INVOICE_NO,'ABC') != 'ABC' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END BILL_STATE --发票标识 FROM ( SELECT '01' ASS_NATURS, '房屋及建筑' ASS_NATURS_NAME, T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, NULL STORE_ID, NULL STORE_NO, T.VEN_ID, T.VEN_NO, T.BACK_MONEY, T.NOTE, T.CREATE_EMP, T.CREATE_DATE, T.BACK_DATE, T.CONFIRM_EMP, T.STATE , '' INVOICE_NO FROM ASS_BACK_HOUSE T WHERE T.STATE=2 UNION ALL SELECT '02' ASS_NATURS, '专用设备' ASS_NATURS_NAME, T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.STORE_ID, T.STORE_NO, T.VEN_ID, T.VEN_NO, T.BACK_MONEY, T.NOTE, T.CREATE_EMP, T.CREATE_DATE, T.BACK_DATE, T.CONFIRM_EMP, T.STATE , T.INVOICE_NO FROM ASS_BACK_SPECIAL T WHERE T.STATE=2 UNION ALL SELECT '03' ASS_NATURS, '一般设备' ASS_NATURS_NAME, T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.STORE_ID, T.STORE_NO, T.VEN_ID, T.VEN_NO, T.BACK_MONEY, T.NOTE, T.CREATE_EMP, T.CREATE_DATE, T.BACK_DATE, T.CONFIRM_EMP, T.STATE , T.INVOICE_NO FROM ASS_BACK_GENERAL T WHERE T.STATE=2 UNION ALL SELECT '04' ASS_NATURS, '其他固定资产' ASS_NATURS_NAME, T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.STORE_ID, T.STORE_NO, T.VEN_ID, T.VEN_NO, T.BACK_MONEY, T.NOTE, T.CREATE_EMP, T.CREATE_DATE, T.BACK_DATE, T.CONFIRM_EMP, T.STATE , T.INVOICE_NO FROM ASS_BACK_OTHER T WHERE T.STATE=2 ) RS LEFT JOIN HOS_SUP_DICT HSD --供应商 ON RS.GROUP_ID=HSD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=HSD.HOS_ID AND RS.VEN_ID=HSD.SUP_ID AND RS.VEN_NO=HSD.SUP_NO LEFT JOIN HOS_STORE_DICT HST --仓库 ON RS.GROUP_ID=HST.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=HST.HOS_ID AND RS.STORE_ID=HST.STORE_ID AND RS.STORE_NO=HST.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SM --制单人 ON RS.GROUP_ID=SM.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=SM.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=SM.COPY_CODE AND RS.CREATE_EMP=SM.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SF --确认人 ON RS.GROUP_ID=SF.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=SF.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=SF.COPY_CODE AND RS.CONFIRM_EMP=SF.USER_ID

root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_ASS_BACK_D AS SELECT RS.GROUP_ID,--集团ID RS.HOS_ID, --单位ID RS.COPY_CODE, --账套编码 RS.ASS_BACK_NO AS BUSINESS_ID, --退货单ID RS.ASS_CARD_NO||RS.SOURCE_ID FUND_ID ,--关联三级主键 AC.ASS_ID , --资产ID ATD.ASS_TYPE_ID AS SUB_TYPE_ID, --分类ID ATD.ASS_TYPE_CODE, --分类编码 ATD.ASS_TYPE_NAME, --分类名称 RS.ASS_CARD_NO, --卡片号 RS.SOURCE_ID, --资金来源ID HS.SOURCE_CODE, --资金来源编码 HS.SOURCE_NAME, --资金来源名称 HSN.NATURE_CODE AS FUND_SOURCE_ATTR, --资金来源属性 HSN.NATURE_NAME AS SOURCE_NATURE_NAME, --资金来源性质名称 (-1*RS.PRICE) PRIM_MONEY, --原值金额 (-1*RS.CUR_MONEY) CUR_MONEY,--净值 (-1*RS.ADD_DEPRE) ADD_DEPRE --累计折旧 FROM ( SELECT T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.ASS_CARD_NO, S.SOURCE_ID, S.PRICE, S.CUR_MONEY, S.ADD_DEPRE FROM ASS_BACK_DETAIL_HOUSE T LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_SOURCE_HOUSE S ON T.GROUP_ID=S.GROUP_ID AND T.HOS_ID=S.HOS_ID AND T.COPY_CODE=S.COPY_CODE AND T.ASS_BACK_NO=S.ASS_BACK_NO AND T.ASS_CARD_NO=S.ASS_CARD_NO UNION ALL SELECT T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.ASS_CARD_NO, S.SOURCE_ID, S.PRICE, S.CUR_MONEY, S.ADD_DEPRE FROM ASS_BACK_DETAIL_SPECIAL T LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_SOURCE_SPECIAL S ON T.GROUP_ID=S.GROUP_ID AND T.HOS_ID=S.HOS_ID AND T.COPY_CODE=S.COPY_CODE AND T.ASS_BACK_NO=S.ASS_BACK_NO AND T.ASS_CARD_NO=S.ASS_CARD_NO UNION ALL SELECT T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.ASS_CARD_NO, S.SOURCE_ID, S.PRICE, S.CUR_MONEY, S.ADD_DEPRE FROM ASS_BACK_DETAIL_GENERAL T LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_SOURCE_GENERAL S ON T.GROUP_ID=S.GROUP_ID AND T.HOS_ID=S.HOS_ID AND T.COPY_CODE=S.COPY_CODE AND T.ASS_BACK_NO=S.ASS_BACK_NO AND T.ASS_CARD_NO=S.ASS_CARD_NO UNION ALL SELECT T.GROUP_ID, T.HOS_ID, T.COPY_CODE, T.ASS_BACK_NO, T.ASS_CARD_NO, S.SOURCE_ID, S.PRICE, S.CUR_MONEY, S.ADD_DEPRE FROM ASS_BACK_DETAIL_OTHER T LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_SOURCE_OTHER S ON T.GROUP_ID=S.GROUP_ID AND T.HOS_ID=S.HOS_ID AND T.COPY_CODE=S.COPY_CODE AND T.ASS_BACK_NO=S.ASS_BACK_NO AND T.ASS_CARD_NO=S.ASS_CARD_NO ) RS LEFT JOIN V_ACC_ASS_CARD AC --资产卡片 ON RS.GROUP_ID=AC.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=AC.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=AC.COPY_CODE AND RS.ASS_CARD_NO=AC.ASS_CARD_NO LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE HS --资金来源 ON RS.GROUP_ID=HS.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=HS.HOS_ID AND RS.SOURCE_ID=HS.SOURCE_ID LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE_NATURE HSN --资金来源性质 ON HS.SOURCE_ATTR=HSN.NATURE_CODE LEFT JOIN ASS_NO_DICT AD --资产字典 ON RS.GROUP_ID=AD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=AD.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=AD.COPY_CODE AND AC.ASS_ID=AD.ASS_ID AND AC.ASS_NO=AD.ASS_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_TYPE_DICT ATD --资产类别 ON RS.GROUP_ID=ATD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=ATD.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=ATD.COPY_CODE AND AD.ASS_TYPE_ID=ATD.ASS_TYPE_ID
